MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH39, EH40 and EH42 postcode areas of North Berwick, East Linton and Dunbar, this is also affecting the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.03pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to on site difficulties locating the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.21pm on Saturday 21st November 2020.
